x728c96bb6ffcd801b8592512d2947d94276131821851aa26d753a33b03e4b5cf","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://509d7ac3e768e0d192bcc89a8f590ad2a43649b65f5cb59308caa1abddf20293","dweb:/ipfs/QmdtsA6QEG28EobjrMQqCtYUvUvgYMFZXH3DSgyRaf4Xi6"]}},"version":1}

allocateLQTY(address[],int176[],int176[].details: The user can only allocate to active initiatives (older than 1 epoch) and has to have enough unallocated LQTY available

params._deltaLQTYVetos: Delta LQTY to allocate to the initiatives as vetos
params._deltaLQTYVotes: Delta LQTY to allocate to the initiatives as votes
params._initiatives: Addresses of the initiatives to allocate to

params._rewardRecipient: Address that will receive the rewards

returns._0: Address of the deployed UserProxy contract

depositLQTY(uint88).details: The caller has to approve this contract to spend the LQTY tokens

returns._0: Address of the user's proxy contract
Epoch start of the current epoch

params._averageTimestamp: Average timestamp at which the LQTY was staked
params._lqtyAmount: Amount of LQTY to convert to votes

multicall(bytes[]).details: The `msg.value` should not be trusted for any method callable from multicall.

params.data: The encoded function data for each of the calls to make to this contract

returns.results: The results from each of the calls passed in via data

EPOCH_DURATION().notice: Duration of an epoch in seconds (e.g. 1 week)

EPOCH_START().notice: Timestamp at which the first epoch starts

EPOCH_VOTING_CUTOFF().notice: Voting period of an epoch in seconds (e.g. 6 days)

MIN_ACCRUAL().notice: Minimum amount of BOLD that have to be accrued for an epoch, otherwise accrual will be skipped for that epoch

MIN_CLAIM().notice: Minimum BOLD amount that has to be claimed, if an initiative doesn't have enough votes to meet the criteria then it's votes a excluded from the vote count and distribution

REGISTRATION_FEE().notice: Amount of BOLD to be paid in order to register a new initiative

REGISTRATION_THRESHOLD_FACTOR().notice: Share of all votes that are necessary to register a new initiative

REGISTRATION_WARM_UP_PERIOD().notice: Number of epochs an initiative has to exist before it can be unregistered

UNREGISTRATION_AFTER_EPOCHS().notice: Number of epochs an initiative has to be inactive before it can be unregistered

UNREGISTRATION_THRESHOLD_FACTOR().notice: Multiple of the voting threshold in vetos that are necessary to unregister an initiative

VOTING_THRESHOLD_FACTOR().notice: Share of all votes that are necessary for an initiative to be included in the vote count

allocateLQTY(address[],int176[],int176[].notice: Allocates the user's LQTY to initiatives

boldAccrued().notice: Returns the amount of BOLD accrued since last epoch (last snapshot)

calculateVotingThreshold().notice: Voting threshold is the max. of either:   - 4% of the total voting LQTY in the previous epoch   - or the minimum number of votes necessary to claim at least MIN_CLAIM BOLD

claimForInitiative(address).notice: Splits accrued funds according to votes received between all initiatives

claimFromStakingV1(address).notice: Claims staking rewards from StakingV1 without unstaking

deployUserProxy().notice: Deploy a new UserProxy contract for the sender

deriveUserProxyAddress(address).notice: Derive the address of a user's proxy contract

epochStart().notice: Returns the timestamp at which the current epoch started

lqtyAllocatedByUserToInitiative(address,.notice: Returns the amount of voting and vetoing LQTY a user allocated to an initiative

lqtyToVotes(uint88,uint256,uint32).notice: Returns the number of votes per LQTY for a user

multicall(bytes[]).notice: Call multiple functions in the current contract and return the data from all of them if they all succeed

registeredInitiatives(address).notice: Returns when an initiative was registered

secondsWithinEpoch().notice: Returns the number of seconds that have gone by since the current epoch started

snapshotVotesForInitiative(address).notice: Snapshots votes for the previous epoch and accrues funds for the current epoch

stakingV1().notice: Address of the LQTY StakingV1 contract

userProxyImplementation().notice: Address of the UserProxy implementation contract

votesForInitiativeSnapshot(address).notice: Returns the vote count snapshot for an initiative of the previous epoch

votesSnapshot().notice: Returns the vote count snapshot of the previous epoch

withdrawLQTY(uint88).notice: Withdraws LQTY and claims any accrued LUSD and ETH rewards from StakingV1
